resources.string:
MÖRK BORG Character Sheet is an independent production by Jake Sage and is not affiliated with Ockult Örtmästare Games or Stockholm Kartell.
It is published under the MÖRK BORG Third Party License.
MÖRK BORG is copyright Ockult Örtmastare Games and Stockholm Kartell.

You can embed up to two dice rolls into the description of this item with $D1 and $D2
You can embed a dice roll into the description with $D1
This attack has no uses remaining
Out of power uses for the day
Cannot use powers while wearing tier 2 or 3 armor
No weapon using this ammo owned. Add one first.
FUMBLE! Double damage and armor reduced by one tier!
You have suffered some grizzly fate. Unless you are pulled from the jaws of death by some twisted unnatural power, your story will end here.
Broken or severed limb. Can\'t act for %1$d rounds.
Lost an eye. Can\'t act for %1$d rounds.
Bleeding out. Death in %1$d hours. All tests are DR 16 in the first hour and DR 18 in the final hour.

string-array.name: magic_fumbles
string-array.item: One by one your teeth fall out. Long, brittle fingernails replace them in your gums. Your smile is horrific and you find it hard to eat.

You feel fine, yet you pustulate with a magical STD. Those intimate with you will die of plague within D4 days, then rise as woeful weeping zombies who track you down in your dreams before finding you in reality.

Your skeleton is possessed by some unearthly force and will do anything to kill you and escape. Drowning or piercing is preferred so the bones are not damaged. Test STRENGTH DR10 in stressful situations or take d4 damage. When you die you become a zombie.
The illusion of the celestial sphere is lifted. You nw see what dwells beyond. And it sees you. Gazing upon a clear night sky drives you mad with fear.
Around you falls an unending snow of black ash which only you and the mad can perceive. Water sickens you from this day on. Only ash, soot, or burnt remains can quench your thirst.

The earth decays around you like wet flesh. You sink 3 feet and cannot climb out without help. Clinging to you, screaming and biting are D4 translucent, crayfish-like children with your face. (3 HP, Bite/Pinch D4)
Your skin tatters like paper, your flesh melts like wax, and your intestines bloat like balloons, bursting and falling out until all that is left is a walking, talking skeleton.
A gnashing gap-toothed mouth splits open on your neck. It spits out your secrets and inner thoughts and can be silenced to sleep only with blood.
The sky warps and stars spin like wheels. Thrown one day into the future, you arrive vomiting Time as evaporating silver bile. A Misery is fulfilled.
Light itself despises you. If you gaze upon a candle, lamp, or torch it goes out.

Within D4 days a vile cocoon heaves itself from the ground, soon bursting and spawning your exact clone. It is unintelligent and begins to spread mischief and suffering. This happens every couple of days until the ground is cleansed with holy water or fire.
Your eyes burn with insufferable agony, bleeding heavily before loosening and falling from their gory pits. You continue to see through them wherever they are.
You and a random nearby creature both pass out. When you wake up, your souls have switched. Welcome to your new flesh.
Five twisted, skeletal arms burst from your back. The hands are mischievous, violent and terribly cruel.
Your skin pales then begins to emit a sickly greenish light. Living things held close to you slowly fall ill. They weaken, their bones become brittle, their teeth and hair fall out.
The Power works, but fate or some demonic force perverts its effects to your precise disadvantage.
The scroll crumbles to tendrils of fine black powder which reach for your nose and mouth. Make a DR14 TOUGHNESS test or lose D10 HP.
The power pierces you like a knife, feeding on your anima. You are permanently gaunt and drawn, insatiably hungry.
You fall through Refva into the esoteric dimension of Cube-Violet, a place of mythical obscurity. The walls are smooth, iridescent and cold. Above, an endless inferno.
Perhaps it is for the best. HE emerges from the shadows. At least your suffering is short, almost instantaneous, as the two-headed basilisk devours you.

string-array.name: magic_fumble_cube_escape
string-array.item: To escape, slay riddling Kulvan (strong goblin) who holds three colorless pearls.
To escape, poison a close friend with crumbled Sict-Shroom (TOUGHNESS DR16 or -D6 HP and hallucinations). They are found only within the cube.
To escape, reach up through the fire to the golden key above. D4 fingers crumble to ash.
The cube is perfect and empty. You can only wait in maddening timeless agony until another fool arrives.

resources.string: A massive two-handed sword. Its unwieldiness prevents the use of scrolls.
A ball of fire hits $D1 creatures dealing $D2 damage per creature.
A creature of your choice becomes confused for 10 minutes.
Move an object up to $D1 square feet for $D2 minutes.
One creature suffocates for $D1 rounds, losing 1D4 HP per round.
Nine Violet Signs Unknot the Storm
Produce $D1 lightning bolts dealing $D2 damage each.
If $D1 is even, summon $D2 skeletons. Otherwise, summon $D2 zombies.
A creature becomes invisible for $D1 rounds or until it is damaged, attacking/defending with DR6.
$D1 creatures fall asleep for one hour unless they succeed a DR 14 test.
All creatures within 30 feet lose a total of $D1 HP.
A creature of your choice gets +$D1 on one roll (damage, test, etc.)
Ask three questions to a deceased creature.
A creature of your choice gains $D1 extra HP for 10 rounds.
One creature, dead for no more than a week, is awakened with terrible memories,.
You may speak with animals for $D1 minutes.
Light or pitch black for $D1 minutes.
You find all traps in your path for $D1 minutes.
One creature blindly obeys a single command.
$D1 HP, bites for $D2. Only obeys you.
$D1 HP, bites for $D2. Obeys no one.
An untrained monkey that loves you, but does not obey any orders. $D1 HP, punch/bite for $D2.
One ration lasts one day for a single person.
Can serve as a disgusting meal.
Toughness DR 14 or $D1 damage and blind for one hour.
One use = one foot of length.

string-array.name: character_quirks_array
string-array.item: %2$s and %3$s, %1$s obsessively collects small sharp stones.
%2$s and %3$s, %1$s won\'t use a blade without first testing it on their own flesh. Their arms are knitted with scars.
%2$s and %3$s, %1$s can\'t stop drinking once they start.
%1$s is %2$s, %3$s, and a gambling addict. They must bet every day. If they lose, they always raise and bet again.
%2$s and %3$s, %1$s cannot tolerate criticism of any kind, which often results in rage and weeping.
%2$s and %3$s, %1$s is unable to get to the point. They have never actually finished a story.
%2$s and %3$s, %1$s\'s best friend is a skull. They always carry it with them and tell it everything. $ trusts no one more.
%2$s and %3$s, %1$s picks their nose so deep it bleeds.
%2$s and %3$s, %1$s laughs hysterically at their own jokes, which they always explain in detail.
%2$s and %3$s, %1$s insists on telling everyone they meet that they are a nihilist and explaining why.
%1$s is %2$s, %3$s, and an inveterate bug eater.
%2$s and %3$s, %1$s\'s stress response is aesthetic display. The worse things get, the fancier they need to be.
%2$s and %3$s, %1$s has a permanent phlegm deposit in their throat. They continuously cough, snort, spit, and swallow.
%2$s and %3$s, %1$s constantly loses important items and forgets vital facts.
%2$s and %3$s, %1$s is an insecure shit-stirrer. They will talk about whoever just left the room.
%2$s and %3$s, %1$s giggles insanely at the worst possible times.
%2$s and %3$s, %1$s whistles while trying to hide. %1$s denies this.
%2$s and %3$s, %1$s makes jewelry from the teeth of the dead.

string-array.name: character_appearance_array
string-array.item: They have a staring, manic gaze.
They are covered in blasphemous tattoos.
%1$s wears a mask to cover their rotting face.
%1$s only has seven toes, causing them to walk with a limp.
They look starved, gaunt and pale.
%1$s\'s hand is replaced with a rusting iron hook.
%1$s is hauntingly beautiful and unnervingly clean.
Their hands are caked with sores.
%1$s has cataracts slowly but surely spreading in both eyes.
%1$s has long, tangled hair, with at least one cockroach in residence.
Their movements are jittery and they talk with a stutter from either nerve damage or stress.
One of %1$s\'s hands lacks a thumb and index finger. They grip things like a lobster.
They have a red, swollen, alcoholic\'s nose.
Making friends is hard for %1$s, possibly due to their resting maniac face.
%1$s has chronic athletes\' foot, which stinks.
They have a recently slashed and stinking eye covered by an eye-patch.
Their nails are cracked and black, threatening to fall off.

string-array.name: character_backstories_array
string-array.item: %1$s is pursued for manslaughter. There is a bounty.
%1$s is in massive debt, with the debt being traded to successively more ruthless groups.
%1$s is in possession of a rare, sought after item.
One of %1$s\'s wounds is cursed, never healing.
%1$s had an illegal, immoral, and secret affair with a member of the royalty. They hold onto proof of it.
Having escaped from a cult, %1$s is terrified and paranoid. Other cultists are everywhere.
%1$s isn\'t really %1$s, but an identity thief who killed and replaced them.
%1$s can never go home, having been banished and disowned for unspecified deeds.
%1$s became a deserter from the military after witnessing a massacre. Now, with a bounty on their head, they find themself hunted by their former friends.
%1$s recently murdered a close relative. VERY recently.
Evil creatures love the scent of %1$s\'s spoor and are drawn to it, bringing disaster in their wake.
A battle wound left a shard of metal slowly inching towards %1$s\'s heart. Every day, there is a 2% chance it reaches it.
Violence forced %1$s into the wilderness. %1$s thinks waving trees are whispering. %1$s talks to, screams at, and attacks trees.
Cursed to share the nightmares of others, %1$s sleeps far, far away.
%1$s is at permanent war with all corvids. There can be no contact without some violence.
After dreaming of an underground temple to a forgotten god, %1$s understands the songs of insects and worms.
%1$s is being tracked and observed by a golem after agreeing to a contract, the details of which have been wiped from their memory.
\"Burn or be burned\" is the fate that %1$s has accepted.
%1$s\'s flesh heals twice as fast, but their companions\' heals twice as slow. %1$s can see a many-eyed \"guardian angel.\"
